price: (17) [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
